Text.Value: Yes. But I'm afraid I forgot to bring any food...

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steps in close to the player, a hungry look in her eyes

EditorData.stateContext: Shadowheart has blood vial in her right hand.

Text.Value: Let's see what comfort we can offer a grieving mother.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
Shadowheart unstops the vial of Nightsong's blood and moves towards the statue of Sel√ªne. The player follows. 

OTS from behind the alter looking up at Shadowheart as she pours the blood across it.

Text.Value: Of course. I'm clearly better at wickedness than you are.
Oh yes? Show me.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steps in close to the player, a hungry look in her eyes

Text.Value: I thought you had no time for lovers anymore - what does this mean for us?
Physically? No... that part is already done. This will wound the spirit. Most deeply, I should hope.
A little healthy competition. Nothing to fear.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Taller players step forward, guiding Shadowheart into a kill by the shoulders.

EditorData.stateContext: Do not show if Streaming Safe == TRUE

Text.Value: Gods, what I wouldn't give to kiss you right now.
Go, then. Maybe you can do better by yourself, though I doubt it.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
The kiss ends, the players face a mix of shock and anticipation. The player's hand comes up subcontiously touching their lip, it's bleeding.

Shadowheart smirks.

Text.Value: I've changed my mind.
First the act of wickedness, then the feast... but I think this will count as both at once.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
Shadowheart topless and still strattling the player, puts her hand on the player's chest, delivers the first half her line, then rolls to a strattling position on top of her--then delivers the second half of her line.

The player reaches down to their own belt line to remove their tunic.

Cut to Shadowheart as she watches the player undress.

Shadowheart pulls the player's head down to her own.
EditorData.SFXTags: Cloth and armour being removed and discarded

Text.Value: Stop being so gentle.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart pulls back from the kneeling kiss, delivers her line, then places a hand on the player's chest, shifting her weight and forcing the player to the ground. She strattles them and kisses, forcefully.

Text.Value: It means nothing. Shar owns my heart. But luckily she's willing to share the rest of me, just this once.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
Shadowheart leans back, Shadowheart crosses her arms, reaching down to her belt line to pull her tunic up.

The player looks up as Shadowheart pantomimes undressing offscreen.
EditorData.SFXTags: Cloth and armour being removed and discarded

Text.Value: That's what makes it so good.
Go, then. Lady Shar's blessings can be for me alone.
Fine suggestions, all. Perhaps another time.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Cut to the desecrated idol, and exit the scene.

EditorData.stateContext: Blood vial gone. Shadowheart and player have some small smears of blood on their hands.

Text.Value: Kiss her.
I'm not afraid. Far from it.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steps in close to the player, a hungry look in her eyes
Shorter race players take Shadowheart by the hand, guiding her into a kiss.

Text.Value: So what shall we be doing? Theft? Arson? Murder? Foul language?
Not at all. So now we feast?
Indeed? And what else might you be willing to do...?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steps in close to the player, a hungry look in her eyes

Text.Value: This is the spot. Looks like someone's left poor Sel√ªne untended...

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player and Shadowheart a tiny, neglected shrine of Sel√ªne - little more than a statue of the moonmaiden in a quiet, overgrown city courtyard. Shadowheart produces a little bottle/vial full of dark red liquid.

The kiss ends, the players face a mix of shock and anticipation. The player's hand comes up subcontiously touching their lip, it's bleeding.

Shadowheart smirks.

Text.Value: A little. I like it.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steps in close to the player, a hungry look in her eyes

Text.Value: What's that? More wine?
This act of wickedness - it isn't going to hurt anyone, is it?
After I offered up the Nightsong to Lady Shar, her blood was on the spear, on my hands, on my clothing. I wrung out every drop I could. Saved it for a special occasion.
Why, feeling threatened?
Kiss her.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: As Shadowheart steps back to admire her work, the player steps forward, smearing the blood around as though finger painting.

Text.Value: No. It ends here. Farewell.
Stop being so gentle.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart steps back from the kiss, delivers her line, then pushes the player to the ground, she kneels, straddling the player. She kisses forcefully.

Further explicit content can be added before this node.

The statue of Sel√ªne looms over them, covered in the blood of Nightsong...

Text.Value: But whatever you have to give... it's not enough, is it?

EditorData.NodeContext: Disappointed, Realising Karlach can't kiss her.

Text.Value: Sel√ªne will forgive me. I did what I had to, for the sake of our partnership.

Something of a much rarer vintage. After I offered up the Nightsong to Lady Shar, her blood was on the spear, on my hands, on my clothing. I wrung out every drop I could. Saved it for a special occasion.
This is wrong.
A shame. I wanted to show you just how rewarding the embrace of darkness could be... but perhaps it is not meant for you. Good night.

EditorData.NodeContext: Disappointed, Realising Karlach can't kiss her.

Text.Value: You did well. I hope you're not trying to surpass me in Lady Shar's graces.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
The statue of Sel√ªne has been desecrated with the blood of her daughter. Red tears trail from the eyes. Assorted graffiti is dotted all over.

The player looks down from the the statue to their bloodied hand.

Shadowheart appears at the player's side. She's bright-eyed and blood-smeared.

Synopsis: On a Moonless night, the faithful of Shar can show worship by committing an act of depravity in Shar‚Äôs name. Shadowheart and the Avatar will engage in some sexual deviancy in order to fulfil this order.
